subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: What three Bruins defensemen — Dougie Hamilton, Torey Krug and Matt Bartkowski — lacked in playoff experience, they made up for with poise and steadiness against the Rangers.
snippet: What three Bruins defensemen — Dougie Hamilton, Torey Krug and Matt Bartkowski — lacked in playoff experience, they made up for with poise and steadiness against the Rangers.
